long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Player HUD free allows players to quickly search, sort and filter heroes. Revolutionize your online play by having access to every level of the game and making the best data-driven decisions.

We're avid and competitive Fantasy Top players (& past professional poker players) who love the games so much that we decided to build our own HUDs, so we could maximize our weekly winnings in the Fantasy Top Main Competitions.
